title.en: Amai Okashi no Nochi wa Amai Dekiai wo - Konyaku Hakisareta Reijou wa Henkyou Haku Shisoku ni Dekiaisareru

altTitles.ja: 甘いお菓子の後は甘い溺愛を～婚約破棄された令嬢は辺境伯子息に溺愛される～

altTitles.ja-ro: Amai Okashi no Nochi wa Amai Dekiai wo - Konyaku Hakisareta Reijou wa Henkyou Haku Shisoku ni Dekiaisareru

altTitles.en: Daughter with a Broken Engagement, Showered with Love by the Margrave's Son

description.en:
When Richelle goes to the royal palace to bring her fiancé, who is busy with work, some homemade sweets, she witnesses a kiss between him and a young lady whom he says is his business partner.
Richelle is stunned, and her fiancé hurls abusive remarks at her. He then ridicules her baking, saying it is a servant's job, and calls off the engagement.
Lucien, the son of a frontier count and a close associate of the crown prince, stands by her side and affirms that the sweets she made taste sweet.
Richelle's love slowly grows under the unknowing doting love of Lucien, who watches over her and spoils her...

biography.en: Not to be mistaken with the H-Artist of the same name, [Nanao](https://mangadex.org/author/80f8855d-7653-46ca-81df-c677fdfa23ca/mahaya).
